Texts.Eng: Chacharra has tech, useful tech to go invisible. You can have tech, for price... ^green;Bring Chacharra ^orange;5 Diamonds^reset;, then Chacharra show you test course for ^orange;Stealth Tech^reset;.
You make Chacharra happy, happy Akki help you! ^orange;Stealth Tech ^reset;almost yours now...
